042
043public class Seasons extends Feature<Seasons.Config> {
044    public static final String ID = "seasons";
045    private static final Map<Key, Key> emptyBiomeMappings = new HashMap<>();
046
047    // Utils
048
049    public static final class ColorModifier {
050        private final Vector3 value;
051        private final boolean hsv;
052        private final double alpha;
053
054        private ColorModifier(Vector3 value, boolean hsv, double alpha) {
055            this.value = value;
056            this.hsv = hsv;
057            this.alpha = alpha;
058        }
059
060        public static ColorModifier hsv(Vector3 value) { return new ColorModifier(value, true, 0); }
061        public static ColorModifier rgba(Vector3 value, double alpha) { return new ColorModifier(value, false, alpha); }
062
063        public Vector3 value() { return value; }
064        public boolean hsv() { return hsv; }
065        public double alpha() { return alpha; }
066
067        public Vector3 combineOn(Vector3 baseRgb) {
068            if (hsv)
069                return baseRgb.rgbToHsv().add(value).hsvToRgb();
070            else
071                return baseRgb.lerp(value, alpha);
072        }
073
074        public static final class Serializer implements TypeSerializer<ColorModifier> {
075            public static final String HSV = "hsv";
076            public static final String RGBA = "rgba";
077
078            @Override
079            public void serialize(Type type, @Nullable ColorModifier obj, ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
080                if (obj == null) node.set(null);
081                else {
082                    if (obj.hsv) {
083                        node.appendListNode().set(HSV);
084                        node.appendListNode().set(obj.value);
085                    } else {
086                        node.appendListNode().set(RGBA);
087                        node.appendListNode().set(obj.value);
088                        node.appendListNode().set(obj.alpha);
089                    }
090                }
091            }
092
093            @Override
094            public ColorModifier deserialize(Type type, ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
095                var nodes = node.childrenList();
096                if (nodes.size() < 1)
097                    throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be a list starting with first element of either `" + HSV + "` or `" + RGBA + "`");
098                String op = Serializers.require(nodes.get(0), String.class);
099                switch (op) {
100                    case HSV -> {
101                        if (nodes.size() < 2)
102                            throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be list of [ 'hsv', HSV color modifier ]");
103                        return ColorModifier.hsv(Serializers.require(nodes.get(1), Vector3.class));
104                    }
105                    case RGBA -> {
106                        if (nodes.size() < 3)
107                            throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be list of [ 'rgba', RGB value, alpha value ]");
108                        return ColorModifier.rgba(
109                                Serializers.require(nodes.get(1), Vector3.class),
110                                nodes.get(2).getDouble()
111                        );
112                    }
113                }
114                throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Unknown color modifier type `" + op + "`");
115            }
116        }
117    }
118
119    @ConfigSerializable
120    public record Season(
121            @NodeKey String name,
122            @Required int weight,
123            @Required Vector3 color,
124            @Nullable ColorModifier foliageColor,
125            @Nullable ColorModifier grassColor,
126            @Nullable ColorModifier fogColor,
127            @Nullable ColorModifier skyColor,
128            @Nullable ColorModifier waterColor,
129            @Nullable ColorModifier waterFogColor,
130            @Nullable Precipitation precipitation
131    ) implements Renderable {
132        public static final String SEASON = "season";
133
134        @Override
135        public Component render(I18N i18n, Locale locale) {
136            return i18n.line(locale, SEASON + "." + name);
137        }
138    }
139
140    // Config
141
142    @ConfigSerializable
143    public static final class Config {
144        transient Seasons feature;
145        public final boolean obfuscateBiomeKeys;
146        public final @Nullable Duration chunkUpdateInterval;
147        public final @Required Map<String, Season> seasons;
148        public final @Required WorldsConfig<WorldConfig> worlds;
149
150        private Config() {
151            obfuscateBiomeKeys = false;
152            chunkUpdateInterval = Duration.duration(1000 * 60);
153            seasons = new HashMap<>();
154            worlds = new WorldsConfig<>();
155        }
156
157        void initialize(Seasons feature) {
158            this.feature = feature;
159            for (var entry : worlds) {
160                try {
161                    entry.getValue().initialize(this);
162                } catch (Exception e) {
163                    throw new RuntimeException("Could not initialize config for world `" + entry.getKey() + "`", e);
164                }
165            }
166        }
167    }
168
169    @ConfigSerializable
170    public static final class WorldConfig {
171        transient Config config;
172        public final @Required Duration cycleLength;
173        public final @Required List<BiomeConfig> biomes;
174        public transient @Nullable BiomeConfig defaultBiome;
175        public transient final Map<Key, Optional<BiomeConfig>> mappedBiomes = new HashMap<>();
176
177        private WorldConfig() {
178            cycleLength = Duration.duration(0);
179            biomes = new ArrayList<>();
180        }
181
182        void initialize(Config config) {
183            this.config = config;
184            for (var biomeConfig : biomes) {
185                if (biomeConfig.biomes.isEmpty()) {
186                    if (defaultBiome == null)
187                        defaultBiome = biomeConfig;
188                    else
189                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot have more than 1 default biome config");
190                }
191            }
192
193            for (var biomeConfig : biomes) {
194                try {
195                    biomeConfig.initialize(this);
196                } catch (Exception e) {
197                    throw new RuntimeException("Could not initialize biome config", e);
198                }
199            }
200
201            for (var biome : Biome.values())
202                biomeConfig(biome.getKey());
203        }
204
205        public Optional<BiomeConfig> defaultBiome() { return Optional.ofNullable(defaultBiome); }
206
207        public Optional<BiomeConfig> biomeConfig(Key key) {
208            //noinspection PatternValidation
209            return mappedBiomes.computeIfAbsent(Key.key(key.namespace(), key.value()), k -> {
210                for (var biomeConfig : biomes) {
211                    if (biomeConfig.biomes.contains(k))
212                        return Optional.of(biomeConfig);
213                }
214                return defaultBiome == null ? Optional.empty() : Optional.of(defaultBiome);
215            });
216        }
217    }
218
219    @ConfigSerializable
220    public static final class BiomeConfig {
221        transient WorldConfig worldConfig;
222        public final List<Key> biomes;
223        public final @Required List<String> seasons;
224        public transient final List<Season> mappedSeasons = new ArrayList<>();
225        public transient final Object2LongMap<Season> durations = new Object2LongArrayMap<>();
226        public transient int lastSeasonIndex = 0;
227
228        private BiomeConfig() {
229            biomes = new ArrayList<>();
230            seasons = new ArrayList<>();
231        }
232
233        void initialize(WorldConfig worldConfig) {
234            this.worldConfig = worldConfig;
235            Config config = worldConfig.config;
236            int totalWeight = 0;
237            for (var seasonName : seasons) {
238                Season season = config.seasons.get(seasonName);
239                if (season == null)
240                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid season name `" + seasonName + "`");
241                mappedSeasons.add(season);
242                totalWeight += season.weight;
243            }
244
245            for (var season : mappedSeasons) {
246                long time = (long) (((double) season.weight / totalWeight) * worldConfig.cycleLength.ms());
247                durations.put(season, time);
248            }
249        }
250
251        public long startsAt(Season season) {
252            long time = 0;
253            for (var current : mappedSeasons) {
254                if (current.equals(season))
255                    return time;
256                time += durations.getLong(current);
257            }
258            return -1;
259        }
260
261        public record CurrentSeason(Season season, int index) {}
262
263        public Optional<CurrentSeason> season(long time) {
264            if (seasons.size() == 0)
265                return Optional.empty();
266            if (seasons.size() == 1)
267                return Optional.of(new CurrentSeason(mappedSeasons.get(0), 0));
268
269            long current = 0;
270            int i = 0;
271            for (var entry : durations.object2LongEntrySet()) {
272                current += entry.getLongValue();
273                if (current > time)
274                    return Optional.of(new CurrentSeason(entry.getKey(), i));
275                ++i;
276            }
277            return Optional.empty();
278        }
279
280        public Optional<CurrentSeason> season(World world) {
281            return season(worldConfig.config.feature.time(world));
282        }
283    }
284
285    private boolean ready;
286    private final Map<Season, Map<Key, Key>> biomeMappings = new HashMap<>();
287    private final Object2LongMap<UUID> seasonTime = new Object2LongArrayMap<>();
288
289    public Seasons(DemeterPlugin plugin) {
290        super(plugin);
291    }
292
293    @Override public String id() { return ID; }
294
295    public Map<Season, Map<Key, Key>> biomeMappings() { return biomeMappings; }
296    public Object2LongMap<UUID> seasonTime() { return seasonTime; }
297
298    public long time(UUID worldId) { return seasonTime.getOrDefault(worldId, 0); }
299    public long time(World world) { return time(world.getUID()); }
300
301    public void time(World world, long time) {
302        seasonTime.put(world.getUID(), time);
303        updateChunks(world);
304    }
305
306    @Override
307    public void configure(ConfigurationNode config) throws SerializationException {
308        ready = false;
309        this.config = config.get(Config.class);
310        if (this.config == null)
311            throw new SerializationException("null");
312        this.config.initialize(this);
313        ready = true;
314    }
315
316    @Override
317    public void enable() {
318        BiomeInjector biomeInjector = plugin.biomeInjector();
319
320        plugin.scheduler().run(Task.repeating(ctx -> {
321            for (var world : Bukkit.getWorlds()) {
322                config.worlds.get(world).ifPresent(worldConfig -> {
323                    long time = (time(world) + ctx.delta()) % worldConfig.cycleLength.ms();
324                    seasonTime.put(world.getUID(), time);
325                });
326            }
327        }, Ticks.MSPT));
328
329        if (config.chunkUpdateInterval != null) {
330            plugin.scheduler().run(Task.repeating(ctx -> updateChunks(), config.chunkUpdateInterval.ms()));
331        }
332
333        var allExisting = new ArrayList<>(biomeInjector.byKey().values());
334        for (var season : config.seasons.values()) {
335            Map<Key, Key> mappings = new HashMap<>();
336            biomeMappings.put(season, mappings);
337            for (var existing : allExisting) {
338                try {
339                    PaperBiomeData data = existing.biomeData();
340                    PaperBiomeEffects effects = data.effects();
341                    double temp = data.temperature();
342                    double humid = data.humidity();
343
344                    if (season.foliageColor != null)
345                        effects = effects.foliage(season.foliageColor.combineOn(
346                                effects.foliage().orElseGet(() -> Vector3.rgb(plugin.foliageColors().get(temp, humid)))));
347                    if (season.grassColor != null)
348                        effects = effects.grass(season.grassColor.combineOn(
349                                effects.grass().orElseGet(() -> Vector3.rgb(plugin.grassColors().get(temp, humid)))));
350                    if (season.fogColor != null)
351                        effects = effects.fog(season.fogColor.combineOn(effects.fog()));
352                    if (season.skyColor != null)
353                        effects = effects.sky(season.skyColor.combineOn(effects.sky()));
354                    if (season.waterColor != null)
355                        effects = effects.water(season.waterColor.combineOn(effects.water()));
356                    if (season.waterFogColor != null)
357                        effects = effects.waterFog(season.waterFogColor.combineOn(effects.waterFog()));
358                    if (season.precipitation != null) {
359                        data = data.precipitation(season.precipitation);
360                        switch (season.precipitation) {
361                            case SNOW -> data = data.temperature(0.1f);
362                            case RAIN -> data = data.temperature(0.2f);
363                        }
364                    }
365
366                    Key key = existing.key();
367                    key = new NamespacedKey(plugin, key.namespace() + "_" + key.value() + "_" +
368                            (config.obfuscateBiomeKeys ? RandomStringUtils.random(8, true, true) : season.name));
369                    if (biomeInjector.get(key) != null) {
370                        plugin.log(Logging.Level.WARNING, "Cannot inject season biome %s as it already exists", key.toString());
371                        continue;
372                    }
373                    mappings.put(existing.key(), biomeInjector.inject(key, data.effects(effects)).key());
374                } catch (RuntimeException e) {
375                    plugin.log(Logging.Level.WARNING, e, "Could not make custom biome for %s of %s", existing.key(), season.name);
376                }
377            }
378        }
379    }
380
381    public void forceUpdateChunks(World world) {
382        for (var player : world.getPlayers()) {
383            for (var chunkKey : MinecommonsPlugin.instance().trackedChunks().tracked(player)) {
384                plugin.biomeInjector().resendBiomes(world.getChunkAt(chunkKey), player);
385            }
386        }
387    }
388
389    public Optional<Season> standardSeason(World world) {
390        return config.worlds.get(world)
391                .flatMap(WorldConfig::defaultBiome)
392                .flatMap(cfg -> cfg.season(world))
393                .map(ssn -> ssn.season);
394    }
395
396    public void updateChunks(World world) {
397        boolean[] update = new boolean[]{false};
398        config.worlds.get(world).ifPresent(worldConfig -> {
399            for (var biomeConfig : worldConfig.biomes) {
400                if (update[0])
401                    break;
402                biomeConfig.season(world).ifPresent(currentSeason -> {
403                    if (currentSeason.index == biomeConfig.lastSeasonIndex)
404                        return;
405                    biomeConfig.lastSeasonIndex = currentSeason.index;
406                    update[0] = true;
407                });
408            }
409        });
410
411        if (update[0])
412            forceUpdateChunks(world);
413    }
414
415    public void updateChunks() {
416        for (var world : Bukkit.getWorlds()) {
417            updateChunks(world);
418        }
419    }
420
421    @Override
422    public void disable() {}
423
424    @Override
425    public void save(ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
426        node.node("season_time").set(seasonTime);
427    }
428
429    @Override
430    public void load(ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
431        var seasonTime = node.node("season_time").get(new TypeToken<Map<UUID, Long>>(){}, Collections.emptyMap());
432        this.seasonTime.putAll(seasonTime);
433    }
434
435    static int i = 0;
436    static long times = 0;
437
438    static Key key = Key.key("minecraft", "forest");
439
440    @Override
441    public void mapChunk(PacketEvent event) {
442        if (!ready)
443            return;
444        Player player = event.getPlayer();
445        World world = player.getWorld();
446        config.worlds.get(world).ifPresent(worldConfig -> {
447            long time = time(world);
448            // BENCHMARKED: the remapper here is quite fast, so to improve performance, the remap process
449            // itself should be improved.
450            plugin.biomeInjector().remapBiomes(event, entry -> worldConfig.biomeConfig(entry.key())
451                    .flatMap(biomeConfig -> biomeConfig.season(time))
452                    .map(season -> biomeMappings.getOrDefault(season.season, emptyBiomeMappings).getOrDefault(entry.key(), entry.key()))
453                    .orElse(entry.key()));
454        });
455    }
456}
